rev.comment: /* Overview */ photo of village bulletin board added
/* China's Great Fertility Reduction: Family Planning and the Transition to a Market Economy */
/* China's Great Fertility Reduction: Family Planning and the Transition to a Market Economy */
/* Overview */ added note on family planning as a one generation policy
/* Overview */ added note on how family planning fines are collected
/* The Desire for Children, Fertility medicines, and Family Planning */
/* The Desire for Children, Fertility medicines, and Family Planning */ added photograph
/* Availability of resources */ added notes on air and water pollution
/* China's Great Fertility Reduction: Family Planning and the Transition to a Market Economy */
/* Achievement */ added material on importance of transition to the market economy for reduction in China's fertility
/* Abandoned or orphaned children and adoption */ added photo of sign forbidding abandonment of baby girls
/* Infanticide */ moved photo to abandonment section
/* Infanticide */ added photo of rural Sichuan sign forbidding abandonment of baby girls
/* Sex-selective abortion */ note that underreporting of births is also an important cause of sex ratio skewing

further documentation of cultural basis of preference for males
